# Keygenerator webservice

RESTfull webservice that generates reproducable Ed25519 keypairs to use in (amongst others) BighChainDB.

## Install

* Make sure you have NodeJS (>= 10) installed 
* Clone this repo
* `cd cloneddir`
* Run `npm install`
* Run `node index.js`

## Context
